neutrino-winds.DE_Solver¶

Module Contents¶

neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.cs = 1¶
neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.M = 10¶
neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.G = 1¶
neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.mB = 1¶
neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.dPdS = 1¶
neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.Se = 0¶
neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.rho = 1¶
neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.T = 1¶
neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.r0 = 1¶
neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.ndf1(psi, coords)¶

Dimensionless f1 function, takes t,(x,y) and returns 1-exp[2y]

neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.ndf2(psi, coords)¶

Dimensionless f2 function, takes t,(x,y) and returns (GM/r0*cs^2)exp[-x]-2

neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.CoupledRungeKuttaStep(af1, af2, fn, t, dt)¶

Takes functions af1 and af2, state f(n), t and dt, and steps f(n) to f(n+dt) using an RK4 method with arbitrary input functions f1 and f2 Returns t+dt,f(n+dt)

neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.percentChange(curr, step)¶

Takes a current state and a new state (vectors) and calculates the percent change

neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.generateFunc(x0, u0, itermax)¶

Generates a trace of wind behavior with initial conditions x0 and u0 (dimensionless) using the RK4 method with adaptation in dt Takes x0, u0, max iteration count and returns a 2D array tracking t, x, and u

neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.makePlot(minX, maxX, dx)¶

Generates a plot of wind curves Takes minX, maxX, dx and generates a curve for x0 (u0=0), then increments x0 by dx and generates a new curve, repeating until x0=maxX Returns 0, prints a plot of the different wind curves

neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.testf(t, x)¶
neutrino-winds.DE_Solver.testf2(t, x)¶
